sentences.en: A pipe is inserted into the receiving opening for replenishment of chips.
sentences.cn: 一根管子插入接收口以充填集成电路块.

sentences.en: Customer tracking and feedback, monthly visit to Beijing retail stores, inventory checking, replenishment and timely replacement.
sentences.cn: 客户销售情况跟踪及反馈, 每月走访北京各经销门店, 清点库存, 及时补货换货.

sentences.en: Develop forecasts and replenishment strategy with supplier and buyers.
sentences.cn: 和供应商及采购制定销售预测和补货策略.

sentences.en: It is an important replenishment of modern liberal education.
sentences.cn: 教育旅游产品有利于促进现代素质教育.

sentences.en: Last year, China also contributed $ 50 million to the replenishment of the African Development Fund.
sentences.cn: 去年, 中国还向非洲发展基金注入了5000万美元.

sentences.en: Make the inventory replenishment recommendation based on the requirement of sales.
sentences.cn: 按销售需求提供库存备库建议清单.

sentences.en: Mastery of the theory of two - bin replenishment models, and re - order point models.
sentences.cn: 精通两箱补充模式和再订购要点模式理论.

sentences.en: Natural replenishment of this vast supply of underground water occurs very slowly.
sentences.cn: 靠自然补充大量地下水是十分缓慢的.

sentences.en: Plain water is the best replenishment of body fluid.
sentences.cn: 要补充身体流失的水分,最好饮用白开水.

sentences.en: Provide Distribution Department with warehouse replenishment information and upcoming trends.
sentences.cn: 向物流部门提供仓库补充信息和趋势分析.

sentences.en: Recently the company is expanding its replenishment and striving for industry pioneer!
sentences.cn: 近来公司正在扩建增资,争创行业先锋!

sentences.en: Since the wartime population needed replenishment, pregnancies were a good sign.
sentences.cn: 最后一桩倒不失为好现象,战时人口正该补充.

sentences.en: Technical change and replenishment cycle shorten.
sentences.cn: 技术变化和供给周期缩短.

sentences.en: The precipitation isa main replenishment sources for plant growth in this area.
sentences.cn: 大气降水是本区植物繁衍的主要补给源.

sentences.en: There is a concern about replenishment of the population.
sentences.cn: 有人担心人口的补充问题。

sentences.en: You skin was very dry, Water replenishment is needed.
sentences.cn: 你的皮肤太干了需要补充水分.

words.tran_cn: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料

trans.tran_en: Replenishment is the process by which something is made full or complete again
